Class AbstractFragmentReport

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.support.v4.app.LoaderManager.LoaderCallbacks<Cursor>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FragmentReportMonthly, FragmentReportWeekly

    public abstract class AbstractFragmentReport
extends AbstractFragmentSend
    Abstract fragment for all reports fragments Created by Olivier Goutet. Openium 2014
